activities: Insperity Expense Management, Inc. offers solutions that automate expense reporting, enforce corporate travel policies, streamline management and provide visibility into a company’s expenditures through data collection, analytics and reporting.  When accessing the software, data from the European Union is sent to ExpensAble’s servers, which are located in Kansas City, Missouri or Bryan, Texas.  These servers then send data back to the users’ local approvers.
